summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2585, for the improvement of Shoreland Drive, form Mount Claire Drive to McClellan Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues by paving the same with asphalt laid upon a proper concrete foundation, with concrete curbs and proper gutters; with the construction or reconstruction of all sewers, side sewers and watermains, with their appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage, drainage, water service and fire protection of said district.
